document.body:
Skip to main content
Shaukin Indian Fast Food
For those craving the true taste of India!
Home Contact Us Menu Catering Comments
Welcome to Shaukin Foods! We are bringing the true taste of roadside Indian fast food to the streets of West Lafayette! Welcome to the Shaukin Foods website where you can view our menu, any upcoming specials and directions to our place What do you think of when you think of Indian food - tandoori chicken, paneer makhani, or butter naan? Traditional Indian cuisine has not done justice to the true taste of India - the tastes of roadside snacks as experienced by a majority of Indians back in India! That's where we come in - we are here to bring the foods you get by the beachside in Bombay or in the movie theatres of Delhi. We invite you to explore the menu on our website and then print the directions to devour it first hand (or you could just follow the heavenly aroma right to our doors!)
News and Events Tuesday, July 3rd - Sunday, July 8th, 2012: The restaurant will be CLOSED. We apologize for any inconvenience. Like us on Facebook to stay current with the latest updates, specials and deals!
West Lafayette, IN Updated Thursday, July 12, 2012 5:54 PM
